titles.title: To amend the San Carlos Apache Tribe Water Rights Settlement Act of 1992 to extend the deadline for completing certain actions described therein.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Native American Affairs.

bill.summary: 8/1/1994--Introduced. Amends the San Carlos Apache Tribe Water Rights Settlement Act of 1992 to extend the completion deadline for certain actions described therein.
